attributes.background: People are getting robbed of there well earned money

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

There are different rates of National Insurance, and we're not sure how much you'd like National Insurance to be reduced by.

You can find out more about National Insurance, and the different rates, here:

https://www.gov.uk/national-insurance/how-much-you-pay

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
